results.name: The Legend of Heroes: Zero no Kiseki KAI

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-3220
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1/10
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Pixel Shader 2.0 or higher; Intel HD Graphics: Clarkdale generation or later; NVIDIA: GeForce 8000 or later; AMD: Radion HD 2000 or later
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game requires a mouse.

  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 Full Color display recommended

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows8.1/10 (Windows RT and 10 Mobile are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core i Processor Series (Low Voltage Processor is not supported)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 620
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card that supports DirectSound
  • Additional Notes: Support Pixel Phaders 2.0 or higher required / A pointing device required
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows8.1/10 (Windows RT and 10 Mobile are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core i Processor Series (Low Voltage Processor is not supported)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1030
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card that supports DirectSound
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720px or higher / Support Pixel Phaders 2.0 or higher required / A pointing device required

results.name: WONDER BOY ASHA in Monster World

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista or Newer
  • Processor: 4 Core Intel/AMD Processor or Greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/Nvidia GPU with 2GB of Vram or Greater
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Sylphine is built on the Ren'Py engine which is fairly light on system resources. Most modern computers should be able to play the game.
